content.title: Pharmacomechanical Catheter-Directed Thrombolysis
content.description: Combined approach using thrombolytic drugs delivered through specialized catheters with or without mechanical adjuncts to accelerate thrombus dissolution.

EKOS_ultrasound_assisted.mechanism: Ultrasound loosens fibrin matrix, enhances drug penetration
EKOS_ultrasound_assisted.advantages: May allow lower lytic dose, faster resolution

protocol_example.access: Establish access beyond thrombus if possible
protocol_example.endpoints: Complete lysis or conversion to mechanical therapy
